links.title: Click panel to view frontiers for all objects

targets.expr:
min((v2_mz_write_frontiers{namespace="$namespace"}) 
+ on (collection_id) group_left (name, type)

(0*(increase(
(min(v2_mz_write_frontiers{namespace="$namespace"}
+ on (collection_id) group_left (cluster_id, cluster_name, name, type)    
 (0* (v2_mz_production_object{workload_class="production", namespace="$namespace", cluster_name="$cluster_name"}))) 
by (collection_id, cluster_id, cluster_name, name, type))
[10m:1m])>0))) by (name, type)

(max by(namespace, instance_id, replica_id, materialize_cloud_generation,mz_context_org_name, collection_id) (mz_dataflow_wallclock_lag_seconds{quantile="1", namespace=~"$namespace"}))

+ on (namespace, instance_id, collection_id) group_left (cluster_name, name, type)

(0*
sum by(namespace, instance_id, cluster_name, collection_id, name, type)
(label_replace(v2_mz_production_object{namespace=~"$namespace", cluster_name="$cluster_name"},"instance_id", "$1", "cluster_id", "(.*)"))

)

panels.title: Seconds of dataflow wallclock lag for $cluster_name by collection

panels.description:
*most recent w/I time range
*missing replica ids indicate compute storage collections

targets.expr:
(max by(materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id, replica_id, materialize_cloud_generation,mz_context_org_name) (mz_dataflow_wallclock_lag_seconds{quantile="1", materialize_cloud_organization_namespace="$namespace", instance_id=~"$cluster_id", replica_id=~"$replica_id"}))

+ on (materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id) group_left (compute_cluster_name)
(0*
sum by(materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id, compute_cluster_name)
(label_replace(mz_compute_cluster_status{materialize_cloud_organization_namespace=~"$namespace"},"instance_id", "$1", "compute_cluster_id", "(.*)"))
)

or on (materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id )

(max by(materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id, replica_id, materialize_cloud_generation,mz_context_org_name) (mz_dataflow_wallclock_lag_seconds{quantile="1", materialize_cloud_organization_namespace="$namespace", instance_id=~".*u.*", instance_id=~"$cluster_id", replica_id=~"$replica_id"}))

panels.title: Current Maximum Wallclock Lag by Cluster, Replica, Generation

targets.expr:
count(
    label_replace(
      max(mz_dataflow_wallclock_lag_seconds{materialize_cloud_organization_namespace="$namespace", collection_id=~".*u.*",instance_id=~"$cluster_id", replica_id=~"$replica_id", quantile="1"}) by (materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id, replica_id, collection_id) <= 2, "bucket", "0-2s", "", ""
    ) 
    or 
    label_replace(
      max(mz_dataflow_wallclock_lag_seconds{materialize_cloud_organization_namespace="$namespace", collection_id=~".*u.*",instance_id=~"$cluster_id", replica_id=~"$replica_id", quantile="1"}) by (materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id, replica_id, collection_id) > 2 and max(mz_dataflow_wallclock_lag_seconds{materialize_cloud_organization_namespace="$namespace", collection_id=~".*u.*",instance_id=~"$cluster_id", replica_id=~"$replica_id", quantile="1"}) by (materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id, replica_id, collection_id) <= 5, "bucket", "2-5s", "", ""
    )
    or 
    label_replace(
      max(mz_dataflow_wallclock_lag_seconds{materialize_cloud_organization_namespace="$namespace", collection_id=~".*u.*",instance_id=~"$cluster_id", replica_id=~"$replica_id", quantile="1"}) by (materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id, replica_id, collection_id) > 5 and max(mz_dataflow_wallclock_lag_seconds{materialize_cloud_organization_namespace="$namespace", collection_id=~".*u.*",instance_id=~"$cluster_id", replica_id=~"$replica_id", quantile="1"}) by (materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id, replica_id, collection_id) <= 60, "bucket", "5-60s", "", ""
    )
     or 
    label_replace(
      max(mz_dataflow_wallclock_lag_seconds{materialize_cloud_organization_namespace="$namespace", collection_id=~".*u.*",instance_id=~"$cluster_id", replica_id=~"$replica_id", quantile="1"}) by (materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id, replica_id, collection_id) > 60, "bucket", "60s+", "", ""
    )

) by (materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, bucket, instance_id, replica_id)

links.title: Click panel to view frontiers for all objects

targets.expr:
min((v2_mz_write_frontiers{namespace="$namespace"}) 
+ on (collection_id) group_left (name, type)

(0*(increase(
(min(v2_mz_write_frontiers{namespace="$namespace"}
+ on (collection_id) group_left (cluster_id, cluster_name, name, type)    
 (0* (v2_mz_production_object{workload_class="production", namespace="$namespace", cluster_name="$cluster_name"}))) 
by (collection_id, cluster_id, cluster_name, name, type))
[10m:1m])>0))) by (name, type)

links.title: Click panel to view frontiers for all objects

targets.expr:
min((v2_mz_write_frontiers{namespace="$namespace"}) 
+ on (collection_id) group_left (name, type)

(0*(increase(
(min(v2_mz_write_frontiers{namespace="$namespace"}
+ on (collection_id) group_left (cluster_id, cluster_name, name, type)    
 (0* (v2_mz_production_object{workload_class="production", namespace="$namespace", cluster_name="$cluster_name"}))) 
by (collection_id, cluster_id, cluster_name, name, type))
[10m:1m])==0))) by (name, type)

(max by(materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id, replica_id) (mz_dataflow_wallclock_lag_seconds{quantile="1", materialize_cloud_organization_namespace="$namespace", replica_id=~"$replica_id"}))

+ on (materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id) group_left (compute_cluster_name)
(0*
sum by(materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id, compute_cluster_name)
(label_replace(mz_compute_cluster_status{materialize_cloud_organization_namespace=~"$namespace"},"instance_id", "$1", "compute_cluster_id", "(.*)"))
)

panels.title: Maximum seconds of dataflow wallclock lag for $replica_id

targets.expr:
(max by(materialize_cloud_organization_namespace, instance_id, replica_id,  collection_id) (mz_dataflow_wallclock_lag_seconds{quantile="1", materialize_cloud_organization_namespace=~"$namespace", instance_id=~"$cluster_id",replica_id=~"$replica_id"}))

+ on (collection_id) group_left (label2)
0 *
max by(collection_id, label2) (
    label_replace(mz_object_id{materialize_cloud_organization_namespace=~"$namespace"}, "collection_id", "$1", "label1", "(.*)")
)

panels.title: Seconds of dataflow wallclock lag for $replica_id by object
